page.title: 04Communication in Barrhead
page.content: { The Post Office}and{British Telecom provide two means of communication in Barrhead.There is a modern telephone exchange in the town which operates with up to date equipment.Recently a new dialling tone has been introduced in all telephones in Barrhead. One main post office and two sub_post offices are situated in the town.Modern technology has made postmen's jobs easier.They work about six hours a day and deliver,on average,about ten thousand letters to the public each day. The post office offers other facilities.These include{National {Savings,Girobank}and{Transcash.}These enable people who do not have an account in a bank to pay bills and have a cash savings account.
